question: Which of the below was the main reason of resignation of Congress Provincial Governments in November, 1939?
option2: British declaration of war (in WW-II) on behalf of India without consulting the Congress
option3: Absense of powers and inability to do anything substantial for public
answer: British declaration of war (in WW-II) on behalf of India without consulting the Congress
explanation: In view of the British declaration of war (in WW-II) on behalf of India without consulting the Congress it was decided at the CWC meeting at Wardha on 22-23 October 1939 not to co-operate with the British in the war, and that the Congress Provincial Governments would resign by the month-end in protest.
